member.name: D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_TILING.WidthInTiles
member.summary: The width in tiles of the subresource.

member.name: D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_TILING.HeightInTiles
member.summary: The height in tiles of the subresource.

member.name: D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_TILING.DepthInTiles
member.summary: The depth in tiles of the subresource.

summary.para: The index of the tile in the overall tiled subresource to start with.

sets StartTileIndexInOverallResource to D3D11_PACKED_TILE (0xffffffff) to indicate that the wholeD3D11_SUBRESOURCE_TILING structure is meaningless, and the info to which the pPackedMipDesc parameter of GetResourceTiling points applies. For packed tiles, the description of the packed mipmaps comes from a structure instead.
